title: ClearedJobs.Net Scraper
description: Extract security-cleared job listings from ClearedJobs.net. Filter by keywords, location, clearance level, and more. Supports API-first extraction with HTML fallback.

searchUrl.title: Search URL
searchUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific ClearedJobs.net search URL. If provided, this will be used instead of search filters below.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of specific job URLs to scrape. Use this to scrape specific job listings.

location.title: Location
location.description: Filter jobs by location (city, state, or region). Leave empty for all locations.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Number of Jobs
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of jobs to collect. Set to a reasonable number to avoid long runs.

max_pages.title: Maximum Number of Pages
max_pages.description: Safety limit on the number of search result pages to visit.

debugLog.title: Debug Log
debugLog.description: Enable detailed debug logging for troubleshooting.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy to avoid rate limiting and blocking. Residential proxies recommended for best results.
